Jean Julien RENAULT

  • Born July 24, 1813 - Saint-Longis, 72295, Sarthe, Pays de la Loire, France
  • Deceased April 13, 1880 - Saint-Rémy-du-Plain, 72317, Sarthe, Pays de la Loire, France, aged 66 years old

Parents

  • Jean RENAULT †1828
  • Marie Françoise TRIGER 1787

Spouses and children

  • Married November 24, 1845, Panon, to Marie Françoise TOURET 1819-1866 with
